actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Aggressive Charge
actions.desc: The urk moves up to their Speed towards an enemy they can see or hear.

special_abilities.name: Bloodied Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: While the berserker is bloodied, they make all attacks with advantage and all attacks against them are made with advantage.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: The berserkers AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Constitution modifier.
